channel.title: Looking For a hoster. REWARD
channel.description:
Well Since my hoster quit, Iv'e been looking for a hoster for over 5 days, now My Dedicated players are getting annoyed, and i dont want too loose them
So i need a hoster that, Can do this: 20/7 / handle 40-50 Players, czar based source, I want an experinced hoster, that Isn't a noob, I dont have time for noobs I have a server to moderate & Forums To moderate, so I'm looking for a good hoster that's not bugging me 24/7
Reward: Now this is why most of you noobs are here, I'd rather not buy dedicated, as most of them are about $35-50 To only host about 40, So im offering you $25 monthly, For your hosting.
So that's $25 a month, I need you to Host for at-least 2-5 months without quitting please,
And just so i know you are not going to scam me, You have to host for at-least 5 days, 20/7-24/7 40-50 No lagg, then i can send you ur first Month's Payment..
If you are Up For this job add my msn - owner-sparkz@hotmail.com / that again owner-sparkz@hotmail.com
